name: podamShouldHandlePojosWithAnnotatedFieldsUsingHibernateConstraintsAnnotations

testSteps.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.SimplePojoWithMultipleAnnotationsToAttribute
Then the object uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.SimplePojoWithMultipleAnnotationsToAttribute@3f345342 should not be null
Then the pojo 28 must be of the type class java.lang.Integer
Then the two objects stringFieldWithPatternRegex and stringFieldWithPatternRegex should be equal
Then the two objects testString and testString should be equal
Then the string value 2BQ4omD should have the length of 7

title: Podam should handle POJOs with multiple annotated fields, ignoring any non Podam annotation
